TopicTitle: The Halo Ring is in orbit!

Articles.Content: After many attempts, I finally have gotten the Halo Ring in orbit!! My next task... is to get one twice as big up! Quite easy actually, should only take 48 more wing pieces and its doubled 8) Otherwise, I might just create a challenge for this: Have a ring, have a bigger ring, and make the smaller go through the bigger on each orbit ;P
Nice job dude, Would have been awesome if it was all just structural pieces instead of engines on it, Maybe you could have edited the weight of the parts?
Regarding your challenge: Yo dawg, I heard you like rings...

Nice job dude, Would have been awesome if it was all just structural pieces instead of engines on it, Maybe you could have edited the weight of the parts?

I\'l try that maybe. I just like to have control if I need to make some sort of adjustment. Im probably going to be launching a second up sometime, so il try what you said

Halo Ring?

That\'s a Stargate, silly.

i hope you know what a halo ring is...

Halo Ring?

That\'s a Stargate, silly.

The one that leads to the Ori?

i hope you know what a halo ring is...

Stargate is also extremely well known.

Nice job dude, Would have been awesome if it was all just structural pieces instead of engines on it, Maybe you could have edited the weight of the parts?

Thinking maybe do the same thing, only have decouplers attached to the engines so you can get rid of them later?
You\'d have to leave something on it or have the command pod seperate from it, unless you want debree in your orbit.
